basics.name: Ryan Seng
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am majoring in B.S. Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I am expected to graduate in Spring 2025

work.summary: Handling of patrons database; selling memberships and classes
highlights: Sells WRC memberships and classes such as group hikes or sailing.
Organizes patron excel sheets to promote efficiency among staff.
Provides information to patrons if needed (phone calls, emails).

work.summary: Built satisfied and loyal customer bases through engagement and uncovering.
highlights: Executed to the company's selling model.
Supported replenishment activities that keep the store full and abundant.
Helped customers checkout and capture phone numbers and email for future visits into the establishment.

volunteer.summary: Contributed volunteer work towards various projects every year.
highlights: Accumilated over 250 hours of volunteer work
Established relationships with leaders to further increase impact of each project.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to students who earn a G.P.A. of 3.5 or higher while taking 12 credits or more.

awards.title: President's Volunteer Service Award - Bronze
awards.summary: Awarded to Young Adults to dedicate over 100 hours of volunteer work over 12 months.
